00048          inline static void copyVector(
00049             const double src[3],    
00050             double dest[3]          
00051          ) throw () {
00052             for ( int i = 0; i < 3; i++ ) dest[i] = src[i];
00053          };
00054 
00057          inline static void copyMatrix(
00058             const double src[3][3],    
00059             double dest[3][3]          
00060          ) throw () {
00061             for ( int i = 0; i < 3; i++ ) {
00062                for ( int j = 0; j < 3; j++ ) dest[i][j] = src[i][j];
00063             }
00064          };
00065 
00068          inline static void copyAmprms(
00069             const double src[21],    
00070             double dest[21]          
00071          ) throw () {
00072             for ( int i = 0; i < 21; i++ ) dest[i] = src[i];
00073          };
